title: Maharani Diamond Emerald Choker - A Royal Statement
materials: Brilliant Cut Diamonds (26.80 carats total diamond weight)
Zambian Emeralds (30.01 carats total emerald weight)
Natural South Sea Pearls (61.86 carats total pearl weight). Featuring Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This exquisite choker showcases intricate floral and paisley motifs meticulously crafted with pave-set diamonds. The neckline is adorned with stunning square-cut Zambian emeralds, adding a touch of royalty. A large oval emerald takes center stage, surrounded by a halo of diamonds. Delicate pearl drops embellish the lower edge, enhancing the necklace's grace. Traditional South Indian 'Vanki' inspired design elements are incorporated into the overall composition.
colors: with vibrant green (emeralds) and creamy white (pearls). The traditional gold and green combination signifies prosperity and fertility.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham (baby shower)
or any event where you want to make a regal statement. Ideal for Muhurtham ceremonies
adding a touch of timeless elegance.
description: This choker is a masterpiece of traditional South Indian craftsmanship, blending timeless design with exquisite gemstones. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds sparkle brilliantly, while the natural South Sea pearls add a touch of understated elegance. Its sturdy construction ensures durability, making it a valuable heirloom piece. The traditional design holds significant cultural value, perfect for the discerning bride who appreciates heritage and luxury.
